00004 #include "dataflow.h"

00010 template <class LatticeType>
00011 class VariableStateTransfer : public IntraDFTransferVisitor
00012 {
00013 protected:
00014   bool modified;
00015   void updateModified(bool latModified) { modified = latModified || modified; }
00016 
00017   const int debugLevel;
00018 
00019   FiniteVarsExprsProductLattice* prodLat;
00020 
00021   LatticeType *getLattice(const SgExpression *sgn) {
00022     return sgn ? getLattice(SgExpr2Var(sgn)) : NULL;
00023   }
00024   LatticeType *getLattice(varID var) {
00025     return dynamic_cast<LatticeType *>(prodLat->getVarLattice(var));
00026   }
00027 
00029   bool getLattices(const SgBinaryOp *sgn, LatticeType* &arg1Lat, LatticeType* &arg2Lat, LatticeType* &resLat) {
00030     arg1Lat = getLattice(sgn->get_lhs_operand());
00031     arg2Lat = getLattice(sgn->get_rhs_operand());
00032     resLat = getLattice(sgn);
00033 
00034     if(isSgCompoundAssignOp(sgn)) {
00035       if(resLat==NULL && arg1Lat != NULL)
00036         resLat = arg1Lat;
00037     }
00038     //Dbg::dbg << "transfer B, resLat="<<resLat<<"\n";
00039 
00040     return (arg1Lat && arg2Lat && resLat);
00041   }
00042   
00043   bool getLattices(const SgUnaryOp *sgn,  LatticeType* &arg1Lat, LatticeType* &arg2Lat, LatticeType* &resLat) {
00044     arg1Lat = getLattice(sgn->get_operand());
00045     resLat = getLattice(sgn);
00046 
00047     // Unary Update
00048     if(isSgMinusMinusOp(sgn) || isSgPlusPlusOp(sgn)) {
00049       arg2Lat = new LatticeType(1);
00050     }
00051     //Dbg::dbg << "res="<<res.str()<<" arg1="<<arg1.str()<<" arg1Lat="<<arg1Lat<<", arg2Lat="<<arg2Lat<<"\n";
00052     //Dbg::dbg << "transfer B, resLat="<<resLat<<"\n";
00053 
00054     return (arg1Lat && arg2Lat && resLat);
00055   }
00056 
00057 public:
00058   VariableStateTransfer(const Function& func, const DataflowNode& n, NodeState& state, const std::vector<Lattice*>& dfInfo, const int &debugLevel_)
00059     : IntraDFTransferVisitor(func, n, state, dfInfo), modified(false), debugLevel(debugLevel_), prodLat(dynamic_cast<FiniteVarsExprsProductLattice*>(*(dfInfo.begin())))
00060   {
00061     //Dbg::dbg << "transfer A prodLat="<<prodLat<<"="<<prodLat->str("    ")<<"\n";
00062     // Make sure that all the lattices are initialized
00063     //prodLat->initialize();
00064     const std::vector<Lattice*>& lattices = prodLat->getLattices();
00065     for(std::vector<Lattice*>::const_iterator it = lattices.begin(); it!=lattices.end(); it++)
00066       (dynamic_cast<LatticeType *>(*it))->initialize();
00067   }
00068 
00069   void visit(SgAssignOp *sgn)
00070   {
00071     LatticeType *lhsLat, *rhsLat, *resLat;
00072     getLattices(sgn, lhsLat, rhsLat, resLat);
00073                 
00074     if(debugLevel>=1) {
00075       if(resLat) Dbg::dbg << "resLat=\n    "<<resLat->str("    ")<<"\n";
00076       if(lhsLat) Dbg::dbg << "lhsLat=\n    "<<lhsLat->str("    ")<<"\n";
00077       if(rhsLat) Dbg::dbg << "rhsLat=\n    "<<rhsLat->str("    ")<<"\n";
00078     }
00079 
00080     // Copy the lattice of the right-hand-side to both the left-hand-side variable and to the assignment expression itself
00081     if(resLat) // If the left-hand-side contains a live expression or variable
00082       { resLat->copy(rhsLat); modified = true; }
00083     if(lhsLat) // If the left-hand-side contains a live expression or variable
00084       { lhsLat->copy(rhsLat); modified = true; }
00085   }
00086 
00087   void visit(SgAssignInitializer *sgn)
00088   {
00089     LatticeType* asgnLat = getLattice(sgn->get_operand());
00090     LatticeType* resLat = getLattice(sgn);
00091 
00092     if(debugLevel>=1) {
00093       if(asgnLat) Dbg::dbg << "asgnLat=    "<<asgnLat->str("    ")<<"\n";
00094       if(resLat) Dbg::dbg << "resLat=    "<<resLat->str("    ")<<"\n";
00095     }
00096 
00097     // If the result expression is live
00098     if(resLat) { resLat->copy(asgnLat); modified = true; }
00099   }
00100 
00101   // XXX: Right now, we take the meet of all of the elements of the
00102   // initializer. This could be enhanced with an improved memory
00103   // abstraction to treat each element individually.
00104   void visit(SgAggregateInitializer *sgn)
00105   {
00106     LatticeType *res = getLattice(sgn);
00107     SgExpressionPtrList &inits = sgn->get_initializers()->get_expressions();
00108     if (inits.size() > 0) {
00109       res->copy(getLattice(inits[0]));
00110       modified = true;
00111       for (size_t i = 1; i < inits.size(); ++i)
00112         res->meetUpdate(getLattice(inits[i]));
00113     }
00114   }
00115 
00116   // XXX: This needs to be handled by an inter-procedural analysis
00117   void visit(SgConstructorInitializer *sgn)
00118   { }
00119 
00120   // XXX: I don't even know what this is - Phil
00121   void visit(SgDesignatedInitializer *sgn)
00122   { }
00123 
00124   void visit(SgInitializedName *initName)
00125   {
00126     LatticeType* varLat = getLattice(initName);
00127 
00128     if(varLat) {
00129       LatticeType* initLat = getLattice(initName->get_initializer());
00130       // If there was no initializer, leave this in its default 'bottom' state
00131       if(initLat) {
00132         varLat->copy(initLat);
00133         modified = true;
00134       }
00135     }
00136   }
00137 
00138   void visit(SgBinaryOp *sgn) {
00139     LatticeType *lhs, *rhs, *res;
00140     getLattices(sgn, lhs, rhs, res);
00141     if (res) {
00142       res->copy(lhs);
00143       res->meetUpdate(rhs);
00144       modified = true;
00145     }
00146   }
00147 
00148   void visit(SgCompoundAssignOp *sgn) {
00149     LatticeType *lhs, *rhs, *res;
00150     getLattices(sgn, lhs, rhs, res);
00151     if (lhs)
00152       updateModified(lhs->meetUpdate(rhs));
00153     // Liveness of the result implies liveness of LHS
00154     if (res) {
00155       res->copy(lhs);
00156       modified = true;
00157     }
00158   }
00159 
00160   void visit(SgCommaOpExp *sgn)
00161   {
00162     LatticeType *lhsLat, *rhsLat, *resLat;
00163     getLattices(sgn, lhsLat, rhsLat, resLat);
00164                 
00165     if (resLat) {
00166       resLat->copy(rhsLat);
00167       modified = true;
00168     }
00169   }
00170 
00171   void visit(SgConditionalExp *sgn)
00172   {
00173     LatticeType *condLat = getLattice(sgn->get_conditional_exp()),
00174                 *trueLat = getLattice(sgn->get_true_exp()),
00175                 *falseLat = getLattice(sgn->get_false_exp()),
00176                 *resLat = getLattice(sgn);
00177 
00178     // Liveness of the result implies liveness of the input expressions
00179     if (resLat) {
00180       resLat->copy(condLat);
00181       resLat->meetUpdate(trueLat);
00182       resLat->meetUpdate(falseLat);
00183       modified = true;
00184     }
00185   }
00186 
00187   void visit(SgScopeOp *)
00188   {
00189     // Documentation says this is no longer used, so explicitly fail if we see it
00190     assert(0);
00191   }
00192 
00193   void visit(SgBitComplementOp *sgn)
00194   {
00195     LatticeType *res = getLattice(sgn);
00196     if (res) {
00197       res->copy(getLattice(sgn->get_operand()));
00198       modified = true;
00199     }
00200   }
00201 };
